itemDescription: 20th century Irish Roman Catholic priest and Neoscholastic philosopher

wikipedia_page.main: Peter Coffey (9 April 1876 – 7 January 1943) was an Irish Roman Catholic priest and neo-scholastic philosopher.

response: * March 6 – First publication of Ludwig Wittgenstein's philosophy of mathematics, a polemical review of Peter Coffey's The Science of Logic written in 1912 when Wittgenstein was an undergraduate studying with Bertrand Russell.
* Ludwig Wittgenstein, review of Peter Coffey's The Science of Logic (1913)
*Peter Coffey (1876–1943), Irish Roman Catholic priest and Neoscholastic philosopher
